channel.title: May I post some Xen bugs right here? Or this is strictly forbidden?
channel.description:
System configuration: OS: Windows 10 Home Edition 64 bit. Processor: i5-3570, 4 cores, 3,4-3,8 GHz. Video card: Radeon R9 280 3Gb. RAM: 16 Gb. 2 sticks of 8. SSD for OS and HDD for game included.
And ready for Xen bug huntin'.

item.title: May I post some Xen bugs right here? Or this is strictly forbidden?
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
You can post them anywhere, but it might be helpful to also post them in the official bug Thread located here https://steamcommunity.com/games/362890/announcements/detail/1613893608676653038

Read full topic
